post:
A LES Exlusive deal!

Something I started a long time ago, the OpenVZ NAT Storage deals. 

Let’s end Cyber Monday with 25% recurring discount on this already super cheap storage. 

On the order form, YOU select the amount of RAM and disk YOU need. 

Example: 750GB disk for ~ $35/6 months. 
Use the promo code below for 25% discount on that price. 

Promo code: 4TC1YFLY7N

Order Link: https://clients.mrvm.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=36


Same rules as with all other NAT Locations. 

Yes, this is OVZ6, still rocking the boat!
